quote: Prayer [is] the quiet, persistent living of our life of desire and faith in the presence of our God.
author: Andrew Murray,  With Christ in the School of Prayer

quote: Writing is prayer.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Prayer is the mortar that holds our house together.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Prayer also forms a type of nutrition for self confidence and keeps you free from worry. It connects you with the main Source of positive energy (Almighty) and recharges you throughout the day. It elevates your plain of thoughts and indirectly guides you to think fruitful and useful thoughts.
author: Sanchita Pandey,  Voyage to Happiness!

quote: We tend to be preoccupied by our problems when we have a heightened sense of vulnerability and a diminished sense of power. Today, see each problem as an invitation to prayer.
author: John Ortberg Jr.,  The Me I Want to Be: Becoming God's Best Version of You

quote: Prayer is the sign of your weakness. Rely on your inner strength. You will be the winner.
author: Amit Ray

quote: When man is with God in awe and love, then he is praying.
author: Karl Rahner,  The Need and the Blessing of Prayer

quote: Many people pray to be kept out of unexpected problems. Some people pray to be able to confront and overcome them.
author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: From faith, hope, and love, the virtues of religion referring to God, there arises a double act which bears on the spiritual communion exercised between God and us; the hearing of the word and prayer.
author: William Ames

quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Answered prayer is the interchange of love between the Father and His child.
author: Andrew Murray

quote: For this reason I tell you: When you pray and ask for something, believe that you have received it, and you will be given whatever you ask for.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version

quote: As for methods of prayer, all are good, as long as they are sincere.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: I don't pray because it doesn't work. Prayer doesn't fix anything. Bad things happen anyway.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Three Weeks With My Brother

quote: I used to pray that God would feed the hungry, or do this or that, but now I pray that he will guide me to do whatever I'm supposed to do, what I can do. I used to pray for answers, but now I'm praying for strength. I used to believe that prayer changes things, but now I know that prayer changes us and we change things.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: God's way of answering the Christian's prayer for more patience, experience, hope and love often is to put him into the furnace of affliction.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: If the only prayer you say throughout your life is "Thank You,"then that will be enough.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Help"is a prayer that is always answered. It doesn't matter how you pray--with your head bowed in silence, or crying out in grief, or dancing. Churches are good for prayer, but so are garages and cars and mountains and showers and dance floors. Years ago I wrote an essay that began, "Some people think that God is in the details, but I have come to believe that God is in the bathroom.
author: Anne Lamott,  Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith

quote: Nothing but prayer can make saints because nothing but God can make saints, and we meet God in prayer. Prayer is the hospital for souls where we meet Doctor God.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Prayer for Beginners

quote: God answers all prayers, but sometimes his answer is 'no'.
author: Dan Brown,  Angels & Demons

quote: I will not pray for health or wealth or splendor; I will pray for a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: When kindness is your religion, then caring is your prayer.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Prayer [10w] Despite God's grace, prayer is not a wish granting well.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The Simple PathSilence is PrayerPrayer is FaithFaith is LoveLove is ServiceThe Fruit of Service is Peace
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Sincere friendship towards God, in all who believe him to be properly an intelligent, willing being, does most apparently, directly, and strongly incline to prayer; and it no less disposes the heart strongly to desire to have our infinitely glorious.
author: Jonathan Edwards

quote: I pray because I can't help myself. I pray because I'm helpless. I pray because the need flows out of me all the time- waking and sleeping. It doesn't change God- it changes me.
author: William Nicholson,  Shadowlands

quote: Your prayer for someone may or may not change them, but it always changes YOU.
author: Craig Groeschel

quote: Go where your best prayers take you.
author: Frederick Buechner

quote: The goal of prayer is to live all of my life and speak all of my words in the joyful awareness of the presence of God.Prayer becomes real when we grasp the reality and goodness of God's constant presence with 'the real me.' Jesus lived his everyday life in conscious awareness of his Father.
author: John Ortberg Jr.,  The Me I Want to Be: Becoming God's Best Version of You

quote: Prayer will make a man cease from sin, or sin will entice a man to cease from prayer.
author: John Bunyan

quote: What have you gained since you haven't prayed? What will you lose if you pray?
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Best Option

quote: I don't pray really, because I don't want to bore God.
author: Orson Welles

quote: I am unable to believe in a God susceptible to prayer. I simply haven't the nerve to imagine a being, a force, a cause which keeps the planets revolving in their orbits, and then suddenly stops in order to give me a bicycle with three speeds.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: A Prayer God, be my light in pitch-black night;Show me the path from wrong to rightThat I might in Your hands be delivered later,Having eclipsed myself to become something greater.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Writer's Prayers That Don't Work "Lord, lead me from the banality of everyday life,to the gleaming one beneath the surface.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Paranormalists, however, insist that our minds are transmitters that, with special effort, can focus like lasers to communicate across great distances, and even make things happen. That may seem far-fetched, but it's also a definition of prayer.
author: Alan Weisman,  The World Without Us

quote: The words were unexpected, but so incisively true. So much of prayer is like that - an encounter with a truth that has sunk to the bottom of the heart, that wants to be found, wants to be spoken, wants to be elevated into the realm of sacredness.
author: Sue Monk Kidd,  Traveling With Pomegranates: A Mother-Daughter Story

quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Why must people kneel down to pray? If I really wanted to pray I’ll tell you what I'd do. I'd go out into a great big field all alone or in the deep, deep woods and I'd look up into the sky—up—up—up—into that lovely blue sky that looks as if there was no end to its blueness. And then I'd just feel a prayer.
author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of Green Gables

quote: Every night I pray I whisper into a megaphone, not only so God is sure to hear, but also my neighbors, because I pray to God He’ll deliver pestilence and plague to the residents next door. I even tell God the exact address, as if He can’t read my heart. But it’s not for His benefit, it’s for my neighbors’.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: The primary purpose of prayer is not to make requests. The primary purpose is to praise, to sing, to chant. Because the essence of prayer is a song, and man cannot live without a song. Prayer may not save us. But prayer may make us worthy of being saved.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel,  Moral Grandeur and Spiritual Audacity: Essays

quote: If we will turn to God in prayer, and if we will seek His comfort through His Words in the Bible, we will find our hearts and minds healed.
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson,  Waiting with God

quote: He prays because he knows he doesn't control it. He's at the mercy of it.
author: Michael Crichton,  Jurassic Park

quote: Man corrupt everything, say Shug. He on your box of grits, in your head, and all over the radio. He try to make you think he everywhere. Soon as you think he everywhere, you think he God. But he ain't. Whenever you trying to pray, and man plop himself on the other end of it, tell him to git lost, say Shug. Conjure up the flowers, wind, water, a big rock.
author: Alice Walker,  The Color Purple

quote: As prayer without faith is but a beating of the air, so trust without prayer [is] but a presumptuous bravado. He that promises to give, and bids us trust His promises, commands us to pray, and expects obedience to his commands. He will give, but not without our asking.
author: Thomas Lye

quote: God will answer you prayers better than you think. Of course, one will not always get exactly what he has asked for....We all have sorrows and disappointments, but one must never forget that, if commended to God, they will issue in good....His own solution is far better than any we could conceive.
author: Fanny J. Crosby
